english.segment1: Let's play keep away. Let's play keep away
english.segment2: It's been a long time. It hasn't been that long. Asking you to come back. Turned out wrong. I feel like a cheater, am I wrong?. I feel like a cheater
english.segment3: I cannot find out. How you'll turn out next. If you change your ways. Baby, that works best. I feel like a preacher, am I wrong?. I feel like a teacher, am I wrong?. Am I wrong?
english.segment4: Well, I know you're gonna change around me. Yeah, I know you're gonna change around me. Well, I know you're gonna change around me. Yeah, I know you're gonna change around me
english.segment5: Today I saw you. Tomorrow slap me sideways. Today I saw you. Tomorrow slap me sideways
